GSD.description:
ALSA: usb-audio: Cancel pending work at closing a MIDI substream

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit 11868ca21585561659c2575b0d6508ef8e9c4291. For more details please see the references link.
